title: That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report FCSSFS23-003, dated November 15, 2023 of the Commissioner of Finance and Corporate Support Services as follows: That the presentation and budget details presented to the November 15, 2023 Finance Committee by the Peterborough Police Services Board for the 2024 Budget be received for information.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report FCSSFS23-003, dated November 15, 2023 of the Commissioner of Finance and Corporate Support Services as follows: That the presentation and budget details presented to the November 15, 2023 Finance Committee by the Peterborough Police Services Board for the 2024 Budget be received for information. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report FCSSFS23-006 dated November 15, 2023 of the Commissioner of Finance and Corporate Support Services as follows: That the presentation and budget details presented to the November 15, 2023 Finance Committee by Innovation Cluster Peterborough and the Kawarthas for the 2024 Budget be received for information.

That Report FCSSFS23-011 and the presentation by Peterborough Public Health be deferred to the November 22, 2023 Finance Committee meeting, and; That the report be updated with additional financial information and identified as Report FCSSFS23-011A on the November 22, 2023 agenda.
That this meeting adjourn at 8:52 p.m.
